title: AD Builds on full AP scaling champs
body: Is it ever a good idea? If so, when is it good to build AD on AP?

replies.body: Generally if the champion has very long range or a way to easily apply their auto attacks.
it would never be more viable but some champs you might wanna try as adc/hybrid are tf kennen and lulu would be most effective. then of course theres the ever popular ad malzahar....
LeBlanc as an ADC can work sometimes. Her Distortion becomes a gapcloser/escape and she has a limited amount of self peel.

Did you know that before they reworked {{champion:18}}, Tristana had zero AD scalings.

It worked because of on hit damage buffs and the attack speeds she gets from her abilities.
She still did have one of the longest range on her Auto attacks. 

So you had an ADC that had zero AD scaling on her abilities.
____
Volibear typically doesn't build any AP if any at all I'm pretty sure.
